name: algiers
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Algeria, in the northern part of the country: Albert Camus studied philosophy at the University of Algiers. I took a taxi to the Roman ruins 50 miles along the coast from Algiers.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Algiers the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Algiers.A group of senior diplomats is expected to travel Algiers for talks later this month, but the scope of its mandate has not yet been fully defined.
